review:
I visited Orange Dental Clinic for root canal treatment and I found the doctors and staff to be extremely polite, friendly and professional.
The Clinic has the latest equipments with qualified doctors. My sincere gratitude to Dr. Baranya ,Dr. Tania and his staff.
Thank you for making my experience pleasant.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I have undergone my RCT under supervision of Dr. Rik Mukherjee.  He has been excellent in his work and the major thing was that he communicated about all the pros and cons of having this treatment.  I would recommend Dr Rik Mukherjee. 
Also the assistance and constant follow up from the reception has been great.

review:
I have visited Orange dental clinic on 07/05/21 for teeth removal and got appointment immediately. Staff of the clinic given me reminder on the previous date and same day of appointment. Dr Somik Bose attended me and done the removal process very carefully and it has done smoothly, myself appreciating his good job. 
S johny, Dy Manager SBI
